prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a sleek, dragon-like body and sharp, icy features.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the power of ice and the majesty of dragons.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a fierce ice dragon, with wings and a chilling aura.
Make a Pokemon with a frosty appearance, icy claws, and a powerful, majestic presence.
Imagine a mythical creature that rules over frozen landscapes, with a body made of ice and storm.
Design a legendary ice-type Pokemon with a rugged, armored look and sharp, jagged features.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the elegance of a dragon with the harshness of ice.
